title: Culture: Decorations (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Decorations subcategory within Culture. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: During the New Year period, traditional decorations made from pine and bamboo are placed in front of houses.
cards.romaji: Sh gatsu no aida, kadomatsu o ie no mae ni kazarimasu.
cards.japanese: 正月の間、門松を家の前に飾ります。
